description: This file defines a helper class for managing a notes database using SQLite in an Android application. It includes methods for creating, updating, deleting, querying, and searching notes, along with database schema creation and upgrade logic.

classes.name: NotesDbHelper
classes.description: A helper class extending SQLiteOpenHelper to manage database creation and version management for notes.

methods.name: onCreate
methods.description: Creates the notes table and indexes when the database is first created.

methods.name: onUpgrade
methods.description: Handles database schema upgrades by dropping and recreating the notes table.

methods.name: insert
methods.description: Inserts a new note into the database.

methods.name: update
methods.description: Updates an existing note in the database.

methods.name: deleteById
methods.description: Deletes a note from the database by its ID.

methods.name: getById
methods.description: Retrieves a note by ID, returning null if not found.

methods.name: queryAll
methods.description: Retrieves all notes ordered by last updated timestamp.

methods.name: search
methods.description: Searches notes by query string and optional tag, matching against title and content.

methods.name: toContentValues
methods.description: Converts a Note object into ContentValues for database operations.

methods.name: fromCursor
methods.description: Creates a Note object from a database cursor.
